name: LAMP
paper: Matrix Profile XVIII: Time Series Mining in the Face of Fast Moving Streams using a Learned Approximate Matrix Profile
description: Learned Approximate Matrix Profile (LAMP) enables constant time approximation of the Matrix Profile value given a newly arriving time series subsequence. With this approximate value, most of the analytics based on the Matrix Profile can be performed, including anomaly detection.
bibtex: @INPROCEEDINGS{8970686,author={Zimmerman, Zachary and Shakibay Senobari, Nader and Funning, Gareth and Papalexakis, Evangelos and Oymak, Samet and Brisk, Philip and Keogh, Eamonn},booktitle={2019 IEEE International Conference on Data Mining (ICDM)}, title={Matrix Profile XVIII: Time Series Mining in the Face of Fast Moving Streams using a Learned Approximate Matrix Profile}, year={2019},volume={},number={},pages={936-945},doi={10.1109/ICDM.2019.00104}}
